name: James P. Delgrande
content: James P. Delgrande James P. Delgrande Professor Emeritus Knowledge Representation and Reasoning School of Computing Science Simon Fraser University 8888 University Drive Burnaby, BC, V5A 1S6, Canada Email: jim < at > cs < dot > sfu < dot > ca Research Interests Knowledge Representation and Reasoning Belief Change Reasoning about Action and Change Nonmonotonic Reasoning Preference Handling Prospective Graduate Students Selected Publications Recent Activities Associate Editor: Artificial Intelligence Journal (AIJ), Jan 1, 2013 -- Dec 31, 2020 Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research (JAIR), July 1, 2010 -- June 30, 2016 Editorial Board: Journal of Philosophical Logic, May 1, 2008 -- Jan 31, 2023 Program Chair: KR 2016 Program Co-Chair (with Frank Wolter) IJCAI 2015 KR Track (with Fangzhen Lin) Recent Program Committees: IJCAI, AAAI, ECAI, KR, NMR, M-PREF, JELIA, FoIKS, etc. Quote of the Moment: Faculty Page | CS Home Page
